title: deriva-cli
description: Command-line uploader, downloader, and metadata tagger for scripted batch operations and CI pipelines.

title: deriva-py
description: Python SDK that provides high-level APIs for ingest, query, schema migration, and automation workflows.

title: Chaise Web UI
description: Model-driven web interface that auto-generates search, browse, and edit pages directly from your ERM metadata.

title: Deriva Workbench
description: Browser-based data curation and visualization workspace that lets teams clean, annotate, and analyze data collaboratively.

title: deriva-qt
description: Cross-platform desktop client (Qt) for power users who need rich drag-and-drop uploads and bulk curation offline.

title: deriva-web
description: Lightweight REST gateway and starter site that lets you embed DERIVA components into custom web apps.

title: deriva-ml
description: GPU-ready Jupyter and Python helpers for pulling curated datasets, training models, and writing results back with full provenance.

title: ERMrest
description: Versioned, schema-flexible relational metadata service that underpins DERIVA’s FAIR data lifecycle.

title: ERMrestJS
description: JavaScript client for ERMrest and Chaise—use it to build bespoke front-ends or extend existing portals.

title: Hatrac Object Store
description: Versioned blob storage with fixity checks, range GETs, and Globus-compatible auth—built for large scientific files.
